section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: TAXA Platform ("we", "us", "our") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, disclose and protect your information when you use our website and services.

section5.title: 5. Data Security
section5.content: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your data, including encryption, secure storage and regular security audits.

section1.title: 1. General Provisions
section1.content: These Terms of Service (hereinafter "Terms") govern the rights and obligations between TAXA Platform (hereinafter "provider") and service users (hereinafter "user"). By using our platform, you agree to these terms.

section2.title: 2. Definitions
section2.platform_desc: TAXA web application available at taxa.sk
section2.services_desc: Automatic income and expense tracking, AI assistance for daily accounting, tax return generation

section3.title: 3. Registration and Account
section3.item_1: Registration is required to use the services
section3.item_2: You must provide truthful and current information during registration
section3.item_3: You are responsible for the security of your password
section3.item_4: One user can have only one active account
section3.item_5: The account is not transferable to another person

section4.title: 4. Services Provided
section4.intro: The platform provides the following services:
section4.service1_desc: Upload an invoice or receipt and TAXA automatically recognizes whether it's income or expense and categorizes it correctly
section4.service2_desc: Don't know how to account for something? Ask the AI trained on the Slovak tax system and get an instant answer
section4.service3_desc: All your income and expenses are ready. Press the button and TAXA generates your complete tax return

section5.title: 5. Fees and Payments
section5.content: Basic platform features are available for free. Advanced features are charged according to the current price list published on the website. All prices include VAT.

section6.title: 6. User Obligations
section6.item_1: Use services in accordance with the law
section6.item_3: Do not use the platform for illegal purposes
section6.item_4: Do not abuse the AI consultant for spam or testing

section7.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
section7.content: Services are provided "as is". The provider is not liable for damages arising from improper use of services or errors in generated tax returns. We recommend consulting results with a tax advisor.

section8.title: 8. Account Termination
section8.content: Users can request account deletion at any time. The provider reserves the right to block or delete an account in case of violation of these Terms.

section9.title: 9. Changes to Terms
section9.content: The provider reserves the right to change these Terms at any time. We will inform users about changes via email and on the website.

section10.title: 10. Final Provisions
section10.content: These Terms are governed by the laws of the Slovak Republic. Any disputes will be resolved by the competent courts of the Slovak Republic.

section1.title: 1. What are Cookies?
section1.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device (computer, tablet, smartphone) when you visit websites. They help us ensure proper website functionality, improve user experience and analyze traffic.

section2.title: 2. Types of Cookies We Use
section2.type1_desc: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. Without them, the site would not work correctly.
section2.type2_desc: Help us understand how users interact with our site. We collect anonymous statistics about traffic.
section2.type3_desc: Allow the site to remember your preferences and settings for a better user experience.
section2.type4_desc: Used to display relevant ads and measure the effectiveness of marketing campaigns.

intro.title: What is GDPR?
intro.content: GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation) is European Union Regulation No. 2016/679 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data. The TAXA platform fully complies with GDPR requirements.

rights.title: Your Rights Under GDPR
rights.right1_desc: You have the right to know what personal data we process about you and request a copy.
rights.right2_desc: You can request correction of incorrect or incomplete personal data.
rights.right3_title: Right to Erasure ('Right to be Forgotten')
rights.right3_desc: You can request deletion of your personal data under certain conditions.
rights.right4_desc: In certain cases, you can request restriction of processing your data.
rights.right5_desc: You have the right to receive your personal data in a structured, commonly used format.
rights.right6_desc: You can object to the processing of your personal data for marketing purposes.
rights.right7_desc: You have the right to lodge a complaint with the Personal Data Protection Office of the Slovak Republic.

exercise.title: How to Exercise Your Rights
exercise.intro: To exercise your rights, you can contact us in the following ways:
exercise.response_time: We will respond within 30 days of receiving your request. In complex cases, we may extend this period by an additional 60 days, which we will inform you about.

legal_basis.title: Legal Basis for Data Processing
legal_basis.basis1_desc: For marketing purposes and analytics cookies, we require your explicit consent.
legal_basis.basis2_desc: We process data necessary to provide our services (tax returns, documents).
legal_basis.basis3_desc: We process data to secure the platform and prevent fraud.
legal_basis.basis4_desc: We retain data necessary to fulfill tax and accounting legal obligations.
